## Find source and headers
FILE(GLOB HEADERS *.h)
FILE(GLOB SOURCES *.c*)

IF(CMAKE_HAS_SORT)
  LIST(SORT HEADERS)
  LIST(SORT SOURCES)
ENDIF(CMAKE_HAS_SORT)

## Build
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DFT2_BUILD_LIBRARY)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
  include
  include/freetype
  depend
  mac
)

ADD_LIBRARY(freetype STATIC ${SOURCES} ${HEADERS})
